description: Maps what we DON'T know — the blank spaces in our understanding. Identifies known unknowns, surfaces potential unknown unknowns, distinguishes unknowable from unknown, and prioritizes collection requirements. Essential for calibrating confidence and planning further research.
researcher_question: What don't we know, and what would we need to find out?

known_knowns.item: string - something established in the text

known_unknowns.question: string - question we know we need answered
known_unknowns.why_important: string - how this affects the analysis
known_unknowns.acknowledged_in_text: boolean - does the text recognize this gap?

unknown_unknowns_surfaced.potential_gap: string - gap the text may not realize exists
unknown_unknowns_surfaced.how_identified: string - what suggested this might be missing

unknowables.item: string - something that may be inherently unknowable
unknowables.why_unknowable: string - information destroyed, inherently private, counterfactual, etc.
unknowables.workaround: string - how analysis proceeds despite unknowability

assumptions_masquerading_as_knowledge.assumption: string - treated as fact but actually assumed
assumptions_masquerading_as_knowledge.actual_status: unverified assumption | plausible inference | convention | speculation
assumptions_masquerading_as_knowledge.testability: easily testable | testable with effort | difficult to test | untestable

critical_gaps.gap_category: source | data | methodology | temporal | causal | contextual | comparative
affects_conclusions: string - which conclusions depend on filling this gap
critical_gaps.fill_difficulty: easy | moderate | difficult | very difficult | impossible

conclusions_affected_by_gaps.robustness: robust despite gaps | weakened by gaps | fundamentally undermined

collection_requirements.collection_type: open_source | primary_research | expert_consultation | data_acquisition | field_work | archival | technical
potential_sources: string - where this info might be found
collection_requirements.expected_value: would resolve uncertainty | would reduce uncertainty | would inform | marginal value

questions_the_text_should_have_asked.question: string
questions_the_text_should_have_asked.why_missing: string - possible reason text didn't address this

outdated_information.item: string - information that may be stale

future_unknowns.item: string - future development that would affect analysis

missing_comparisons.missing_comparator: string - what should also be compared

missing_baselines.baseline_needed: string - what baseline would contextualize this

meta.text_self_awareness: high | medium | low - does text acknowledge its gaps?

extraction.core_question: What don't we know, and what would we need to find out?
extraction_steps: Read the document carefully to understand the context
Identify key items matching the analysis type
